this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: MonitorSite path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/waf/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/monitoring content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum enable monitoring mode
desc sites in monitoring mode accept incoming requests and log but take no action on policy and rule violations a sitges waf feature must be enabled for monitoring mode to apply otherwise monitoring mode will take effect the next time the waf feature is enabled
